content: MQT Beam clamp Galvanized beam clamp for connecting MQ strut channels directly to steel beams ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - ### FEATURES:Features Easier installation and positioning of strut channels No drilling or welding necessary Applications Compatible with steel beams with max. flange thickness of 23 mm ### TECHNICAL DATA: Surface finish: Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized Environmental conditions: Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) Technical Data | Material composition | Claw plate: S235JR - DIN EN 10025, U-bolt: S235JRG2 - DIN EN 10025, Nut - DIN 50961 | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) ### ITEMS- 369675 - Beam clamp MQT-21-41 - Package Size 10 pc - 369676 - Beam clamp MQT-41-82 - Package Size 10 pc - 369677 - Beam clamp MQT-82-124 - Package Size 10 pc
